mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(company_id, notice_title, notice_period, notice_dept, notice_position, notice_task, notice_sal, notice_qual, notice_career, notice_wellfare, job_id) VALUES(#{companyId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticePeriod},#{noticeDept},#{noticePosition},#{noticeTask},#{noticeSal},#{noticeQual},#{noticeCareer}, #{noticeWellfare},#{jobId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_period DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_period = #{noticePeriod}, notice_dept = #{noticeDept}, notice_position = #{noticePosition}, notice_task = #{noticeTask}, notice_sal = #{noticeSal}, notice_qual = #{noticeQual}, notice_career = #{noticeCareer}, notice_wellfare = #{noticeWellfare}, job_id = #{jobId} WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: SELECT nj.*, i.intro_id, i.intro_coname, i.intro_birth, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location FROM (SELECT n.*, j.job_name, j.job_code FROM notice n INNER JOIN job j ON n.job_id = j.job_id) nj INNER JOIN intro i ON nj.company_id = i.company_id WHERE nj.notice_id = #{noticeId}
SELECT ns.* FROM (SELECT n.* FROM notice n INNER JOIN subscribe s ON n.company_id = s.company_id WHERE s.employee_id = #{employeeId}) ns ORDER BY ns.notice_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM notice n INNER JOIN job j ON n.job_id = j.job_id WHERE j.job_code = #{jobCode} ORDER BY n.notice_period DESC

SELECT n.* FROM notice n INNER JOIN (SELECT c.job_id FROM emp_check c INNER JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE c.employee_id = #{employeeId}) ec ON n.job_id = ec.job_id ORDER BY n.notice_period DESC
